================ =
## Tender Information for the Supply of Wood and Construction Materials
### Tender Announcement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the supply of Wood and Construction Materials.

### Tender Details
| Category | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract Reference | WS3793404095-Doc3793436912 |
| Tender Identification Number | WS3793404095 |
| Tender Closing Date and Time | January 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | January 10, 2024 |
| Regions of Delivery | Quebec (excluding National Capital Region) |

### Classification
The solicited goods and services are classified under 30000000: [Structures and Building and Construction and Manufacturing Components and Supplies](https://unstats.un.org/unsd/classifications/unclassified/msp/code-14101).

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Procurement Method
The PSPC will conduct this procurement using a Competitive Traditional method.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:
Lavoie, Corine
(elle-la / she-her) (SPAC/PSPC)
Corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: No phone number or fax information is available.
